path.font-family: Lato, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Liberation Sans", sans-serif
path.style: font-family: Lato, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Liberation Sans", sans-serif; stroke: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0.7px; fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-family: "Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", "Liberation Serif", serif; font-size: 25.2px;

path.font-family: Lato, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Liberation Sans", sans-serif
path.style: font-family: Lato, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Liberation Sans", sans-serif; stroke: rgb(153, 153, 153); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0.5px; fill: none; fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-family: Lato, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Liberation Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 16px;
text.content: Civil conflicts with foreign state intervention

path.style: font-family: Lato, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Liberation Sans", sans-serif; stroke: none; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1px; fill: rgb(177, 53, 7); fill-opacity: 0.7;

path.style: font-family: Lato, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Liberation Sans", sans-serif; stroke: none; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1px; fill: rgb(60, 78, 102); fill-opacity: 0.7;
